nodes.text: Koba was a planet on the Cerean Reach in the Mid Rim. It was ravaged by Tulak the Advozse warlord, but later protected from his son Kalut by Jedi Knight Yaddle.

Koba's history is discussed in "Yaddle's Tale: The One Below", a Star Wars Tales story with an unclear level of canonicity. While the main story has been referenced in other stories, the framing story has continuity errors.
Koba is called "Koda" in The Shadow Trap and the natives "Kodans".
